data_table.description: Health and Life Profile (Maastricht Vital Exhaustion Questionnaire), Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HPBAFLAG
variable.description: =1 if form is present [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBACY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA01
variable.description: Do you often feel tired? Q1 [Health and Life Profile (Maastricht Vital Exhaustion Questionnaire), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA02
variable.description: Do you often have trouble falling asleep? Q2 [Health and Life Profile (Maastricht Vital Exhaustion Questionnaire), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA03
variable.description: Do you wake up repeatedly during the night? Q3 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA04
variable.description: Do you feel weak all over? Q4 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA05
variable.description: Do you have the feeling that you haven't been accomplishing much lately? Q5 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA06
variable.description: Do you have the feeling that you can't cope with everyday problems as well as you used to? Q6 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA07
variable.description: Do you believe that you have come to a "dead end"? Q7 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA08
variable.description: Do you lately feel more listless than before? Q8 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA09
variable.description: Do you enjoy sex as much as ever? Q9 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA10
variable.description: Have you ever experienced a feeling of hopelessness recently? Q10 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA11
variable.description: Does it take more time to grasp a difficult problem than it did a year ago? Q11 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA12
variable.description: Do little things irritate you more lately than they used to? [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA13
variable.description: Do you feel you want to give up trying? Q13 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA14
variable.description: Do you feel fine? Q14 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA15
variable.description: Do you sometimes feel that your body is like a battery that is losing its power? Q15 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA16
variable.description: Would you want to be dead at times? Q16 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA17
variable.description: Do you have the feeling these days that you just don't have what it takes any more? Q17 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA18
variable.description: Do you feel rejected? Q18 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA19
variable.description: Do you feel like crying sometimes? Q19 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA20
variable.description: Do you ever wake up with a feeling of exhaustion and fatigue? Q20 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA21
variable.description: Do you have difficulty in concentrating on a single subject? Q21 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPBA23
variable.description: Type of administration. Q23 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]
